website_summaries.verdict: An exceptionally well crafted jump rope that's steadily gaining recognition in the fitness industry for its quality design and excellent performance.
pros: Double ball bearings paired with a lightweight cable
cons: Not long enough for people over 6 feet

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the more expensive ropes but was struggling. The combination of the light handles and a bit heavier rope are a perfect combo for me. This was my first WOD with this rope and members were impressed with my Double Unders saying I was really whipping the rope like it was nothing. I didn’t get the typical arm/shoulder fatigue like I usually do. For the price you can’t beat this. I can’t speak to its durability yet, but I hope it lasts forever. I do already have some paint chipping off the handle after my first workout. That’s not a concern for me, though. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno44

customer_reviews.title: the grip is good, and the cable isn't wrapping or twisting on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light rope with smooth rotation. The handles are metal, the grip is good, and the cable isn't wrapping or twisting on itself. The cable is easily adjustable, but you'll need wire cutters to snip off the excess. Its very nice to move up from box store jump ropes, but this kind of rope can take some getting used to if you tend to rotate or spin the handles when you jump.
customer_reviews.author: StraightUpReviewsTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Alternative for Your Fitness Routine
customer_reviews.text: I recently took up jumping rope as an alternative to other cardio methods. I must say that I was surprised how quickly jumping rope elevates your heart rate and although I as fit from running and other workouts, I had to adjust to the intensity of jumping a rope. I love how a 5 - 10 min routine is challenging and yields the same results as a much longer run or cardio machine workout. I have also noticed a difference in my energy levels and physique after only a few weeks of jumping 3-4 days a week. I highly recommend to those looking to complement or change up a stale workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: mbprime

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews here are true when it comes to how it feels when you're jump roping- it's great for its speed and how light it feels. But my jump rope snapped (the handle snapped from the screw and rope) only after a month of using it. I use it fairly often since I go to a bootcamp/crossfit-type gym. I really would give this rope rave reviews, but it was worthless after a month since I couldn't find the missing parts that snapped off :(
customer_reviews.author: Gretch

customer_reviews.title: Good Rope for Crossfit
customer_reviews.text: This is equivalent to many of the more expensive ropes. I am not afraid to wear this out on my concrete floor. It is lightweight and fast enough for double unders. I learned double unders on a heavier rope; this light weight one took a little getting used to. I like the spare rope they provide and the little storage bag is a nice perk too. If your a cross-fitter trying to save a dollar, this is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good jump rope that’s not really all that durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like this jump rope, and it comes with a spare set. I’ve only used this for max 10-20 sessions. I expected that maybe the covering for the wire would come apart from being scraped against the floor, but nope: a piece of the metal came out from the tip of the handles. Slightly dangerous, slightly inconvenient, not what I was expecting after having paid a little more for a better built jump rope. The three stars is because this happened within a year of use. That being said, I fixed this with a pair of pliers and duct tape, we’ll see how long that lasts. Still usable, just don’t want to risk poking myself.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to jumping rope and was looking for more than the old cheap jump rope I had. When I went to upgrade, I saw some very nice looking but also extremely expensive jump ropes. This is just what I was looking for. Something that was lightweight, didn't coil or bend during use and has bearings in the handles so the rope twirls effortlessly. Yes, the more expensive ones are probably even nicer but I doubt they're 6x nicer and some are 6x the price of these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jump rope - no way there's a better value on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my personal trainer sister, but she never used it. Then I bought one for myself because I wanted a travel rope and only had a big ol leather behemoth...this guy is awesome! Super light, but still really quick. the bag is really helpful too, as I put my phone and keys in there when working out. I was deciding between this one and one of the ropes that cost 3x the amount...there's no way a jump rope can be built that is 3x better than this rope. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Great for speed or regular use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a "speed" jump-roper, but use this as a regular jump rope for workouts and love it. I'm limited on surfaces to use it on, so the black cord has gotten scuffed on the concrete, but it came with an extra piece. I'll already have the parts when needing to replace it. Yay! To give the cord some credit, I've had the jump rope for a couple years now and use it intermittently throughout the year (I don't have the best workout regimen). Haven't had to replace it yet. :) I store it hanging up long or wrapped in a loose circle and it easily unwinds to it's awesome regular shape no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aloysius

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle!
customer_reviews.text: Return window closed 9 days ago and the handle just broke while I was using it during a workout. Early after getting it I contacted the seller to see if I could purchase a longer cable as the one it comes with isn’t long enough for my height. I never heard a response. I decided to learn to use it regardless of the length and it was a great workout while it lasted. But now it’s useless. So yeah, I don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Noble

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE my new rope. The main reason I got a new one is because my last rope kept twisting after every attempt at DU’s and I’d have to take a good 15 seconds to untwist in between attempts. My singles are even much better with this rope. Love the material of the grippy handle part... it’s perfect. I’ve been told it’s a bit heavier and maybe for a beginner learning double unders. I tried one that’s not for beginners and I’d choose this one over and over.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: just check your screws
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for me and one for my husband. My husband is 6' 4" and the rope was not long enough to accommodate his height. It works great for me. I am 5' 3". It was easy to adjust and get started. I continually check my screws so I have never had it come undone while jumping but my husband has and he lost his screw.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goguen

customer_reviews.title: Great jump rope.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jump rope. Build quality is outstanding. The jump rope itself is actually a metal wire. Nice padding on the handles. It has a nice weight to it. It takes very little effort to actually spin the rope. This way you can concentrate more on jumping :).
customer_reviews.author: ciprian cosma

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add variety to my workout. I thought I was just getting a jump rope, but it was higher-end than I'd expected. The speed rope is packaged well and is designed and manufactured to high standards. Great quality and it functions perfectly. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Willeyez

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: On one end the transaction was extremely smooth and without any issues (item arrived as expected). On the other end, I have to say that this product is of amazing quality. Not only it is a very light jump rope it is also a very fast jump rope. Also, their customer service was great (I received an email from one of Fitskuad's management asking if I was satisfied with the product. Because of all of this I would gladly recommend this vendor/product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, but for advanced
customer_reviews.text: This jump rope is amazing, spins fast and makes my cardio workouts so much fun, but with that being said it’s important to note that this product is a 5 out of 5, but if you’re just starting to workout with a jump rope I’d recommend getting a more beginner friendly one, this jump ropes speed is great but one mistake and it will whip you hard! Or you can just take it easy, regardless I’ve alreaey recommended this to most of my gym pals :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get One!
customer_reviews.text: This speed rope was purchased mainly because of the length. At 6'2" I needed a jump rope that would clear my head easily. It has excellent flow, and is a quality product. This is my first purchase of a speed rope with bearings. It will not be the last. This company also has an excellent warranty that comes with there products.
customer_reviews.author: 1ManleyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: It came without instructions and I know a jump rope shouldn't have instructions but the way the handles are set up with some little nuts ??if it would of come with instructions on how to det up the handles I would give it a try but I even tried looking up videos in their own page and nothing and on YouTube. Couldn't find anything.. So, Idk.. also the instructions on how to measure the length was very vague as well. Will be re selling because definitely not what I was looking for and for what I want it to use for either. There's most likely nothing wrong I just probably chose the wrong one. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: Lerie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but breaks easily even after tightened
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the rope about 10 times and the first rope broke on me the third time and I lost some of the pieces from it bc it flew off while doing dubs. The second rope I used to replace the first and this broke also mid WOD. It’s the perfect weight for me just not very durable even after tightening the ends extremely tight. Very frustrating because I had so much hope and really loved the weight. I wanted to order it again because when it did work it was great but i figured i would go through it quickly again and have to buy another. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner rope
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have an inexpensive quality rope I could use in the garage away from the gym. This one works great! It's lightweight and the line itself seems to be high quality. I try not to punish it on the concrete by putting a mat down though. The line is very easy to adjust. I did notice the screws for the adjustment seemed to be larger than is necessary though. They don't seem to be a problem but just overkill. May work better for those with grip problems in their fingers.
customer_reviews.author: John D Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Good speed rope
customer_reviews.text: I liked this rope it was an excellent speed rope with good metal handls that feel sturdy, I also love the adjustability of the rope on how you can change the length of it without having to cut the rope it's self which I liked, my only grioe with it is the durability of the rope itself after about 7 days the rope started to strip away showing the metal wire. Other than that I enjoyed it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very good rope
customer_reviews.text: I took my time for writing a review on this rope but I really wanted to test it for a while. I have shared the rope with friends of different heights and I like the easy way you can adjust the length of the rope. The grip feels very good also and the rope responds very quickly to your hands' movements. I have noticed my arms fatigue less in comparison with my previous rope.
customer_reviews.author: Amilcar Torres

customer_reviews.title: Screw for length adjustment - Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I decided to change the length of the rope and the screw for adjusting the length just broke. It won't screw back in place. Very poor quality! I've only had this for 37 days and hardly used. The screw design for length adjustment is not the best idea unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: HAL 9000

customer_reviews.title: Best jump rope
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! I do CrossFit and this has been great for my DU. I’d buy this again. Super fast. Just read directions and put it together correctly. It comes with an extra rope. The color is vibrant. Very nice! I’d buy it again. I have had this for a month now. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great rope!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best jump rope I've ever used and as long as their available the last one too.I was using this rope with ease right away and I even was was hitting double unders with no adjustments. The bearings and overall construction of this rope far exceeded my expectations. The handles are perfect on this rope. If you're thinking about buying this rope go ahead and get it. You definitely won't regret it. You can't buy a rope of this caliber at any chain sporting goods store I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Jump Rope.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third rope pirchase we have made. Not to replace but to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a jumprope it's freakin amazing. We both use it at CrossFit and for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, one for me, and one for my wife. As a jumprope it's freakin amazing. We both use it at CrossFit and for general fitness use. One thing I suggest, however, is making sure the adjustment knob is tight before any WOD where you might be tired and accidentally step on the rope. My screw fell off in the middle of a WOD and I lost it. Fortunately the set comes with an extra rope, screws, etc. But the screw can wiggle free over time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Weak cable
customer_reviews.text: Cable broke after 3 and a half months. Luckily it came with a spare, which I'm hoping last significantly longer. Otherwise it worked great up until it broke
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a week, but I'm very happy with it so far. I'm new to jump rope workouts and I was using an old plastic one from my childhood that I found in the garage. This rope is a huge improvement! The rope length was really easy to adjust and it works great. The handles spin nicely and have a nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: CaitM

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for advanced or beginners
customer_reviews.text: East. Light. Soft. Beautiful. This was s gift. The new owner is more than happy with it. It is better than anything he tried in a crossfit box.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana PiegariTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bent on 1st Day
customer_reviews.text: The handle is great but the wire rope bent on the first day. It’s not good for doing side swings. I went and bought another rope after the replacement rope bent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Love my new jump rope
customer_reviews.text: Received my rope last week, gave it a go at the gym was fabulous. I have been skipping with a leather rope for a little while, too floppy. Borrowed a friend's rope with a cable/wire insert, AAA Punch brand, too heavy. This Fitskuad is, 'not too heavy not too light, just right' like the add for a food product we know in Australia (not naming it for obvious reasons). Do not use on concrete, will wear it out. Works well on parquet floor or an exercise mat. Before and after sales communication from Roger Duncan, Co-Founder of FitSkuad, has been exemplary. He actually takes time, to address your queries, rather than provide standard, copy and paste answers. Thank you Roger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rope
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cross-fit style rope to use in my garage and this fit the bill. Quality enough for the price, bearings in the handle make it smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if I could give this a negative I would. It was nice to start with, and it came with two cables. However, after a few times using it, the black rubber encasing the cable started to fray. After a few more times using it, the actually cable started to fray. Eventually the cable completely broke and I had to use the replacement. Now the replacement cable has deteriorated in the same way. Not a good product. Now I have to buy a new jump rope and wait for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Emmett

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, used it for a while and then I thought I lost it, but I liked it well enough that I bought the same one again as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Murch1jm

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors and fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This jump rope was recently purchased, but working well. I purchased one in blue and one in green so that my daughter and I could easily tell them apart. The cable seems to be the right weight to do double unders.
customer_reviews.author: L. McC

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This jump rope is absolutely perfect! It's lightweight with adjustable length. The handles are designed perfectly to fit in your hands and they swivel nicely while in use. It comes with a nice carrying bag, which is great because I can never find a jumprope at my fancy schmancy gym, (I think the trainers hide them) and the weight of the rope plus the bag makes it easily portable. Fitskuad kindly included an additional replacement rope. I couldn't be more happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MiaPia7

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Rope
customer_reviews.text: Great Rope. Comes with 2 ropes. Cut one short to be faster and leave one longer for crossovers and other tricks. Sturdy metal handles and clamps show the quality of the product. Rope is metal core, won't tangle up, and has no memory. Makes double unders easy and even have done a couple of triple unders. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Best Jump Rope on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best rope I have used to date! I jump rope every day and was looking for a new speed rope that was quality made. I am very glad I came across this one. Double under are almost effortless with this rope. Don't skimp and buy one of the cheap plastic speed ropes. The customer service is also top notch. I had a question and the owner responded to me almost instantly. Love the rope so much I am buying another to be my dedicated outdoor rope.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off, no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Broke twice within 2 weeks, the second time it broke in half, see pics. Their website states that all emails are answered within 24 hours. I wrote them 2 emails with no reply. Just a horrible product and absolutely no customer support at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this with my Amazon account and I was really impressed with the construction and I like that it's all metal!
customer_reviews.author: peggiebennett

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for the best jump rope you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: I received the jump rope quite quickly and have been using it in my crossfit classes. I must say that this is by far the best jump rope that I have ever used. The bearings in the handles make it effortless to use. I was doing double under's almost immediately. The jump rope came with and additional cable and is very easy to interchange. This is great value for money for a great quality product. I highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best jump rope I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love this rope - the best I've every owned. I'm not doing double-unders anymore, only fitness/cardio. Best features of this rope are the ball-bearing facilitated rotating rope/cable attachments to the handles and the rope is a rubber coated cable that doesn't kink. The included cables will most likely need to be adjusted to the proper length, you'll need plier-cutters to make a clean cut. Follow the included instructions to adjust the rope length appropriately. I definitely recommend this rope to all skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M

customer_reviews.title: Great for experienced ropers
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding speed rope that is more durable and user friendly than my last one. Very durable but I would recommend it to intermediate or experienced rompers only, it moves to fast and can be very hard to see for those attempting DUs or speed rope.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda

customer_reviews.title: It's Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this jump rope. I was so hoping the reviews were legit, and they are. This rope makes me want to jump rope all the time now. I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Marti Willis

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent rope but just not for me...and for that reason I'm out. No in all honesty I was excited about this rope since the reviews were so good and I thought I would save myself some money instead of paying $50 for a RX one. I should have just payed the $50...like I said this rope is OK, just not for me, it's way to light and the rope material stretches when u jump. The handles are nice though. Just wish the cable would be a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Issac Leos

customer_reviews.title: Too sluggish for double unders
customer_reviews.text: This thick, soft rope is too sluggish for stringing double unders. I gave it away, and went back to a thin metal "rope." ...Company is good to do business with though. Just don't personally like the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Poole

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this jump rope
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jump rope. I had an RPM jump rope that I bought for $60.00. This one exceeds all expectations and performs better than my RPM jump rope. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Syles S.

customer_reviews.title: One flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great jump ropes, and I have three of these. However, I can't recommend them if they have the removable set screws I've included photos of. They always come loose and fall out and I've lost a few. I'll have to hunt down some kind of clamp, but the manufacturers need to find a better solution for this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vagner

customer_reviews.title: Jump rope Breaks 😩
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product disappointed greatly. Not even a month and it unravels. Worst of all I reached out to the manufacturer and never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: rose lombrano

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased the jumping rope from FitSkuad and I am delighted with the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the jumping rope from FitSkuad and I am delighted with the product. It is so lightweight and extremely fast and I have been using it every day since it was delivered. It is such a pleasure to use this jump rope. I will highly recommend this jump rope to any beginner and or the more experienced rope jumpers out there. Best of luck to all you jumpers out there Corné
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: First day and I have made more progress with double unders in one day than I have in several months with my standard jump rope. It’s not a miracle rope that magically enables you to do DU’s, but it is a very good quality rope. The rope spins quickly and responds well to motions from the wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Mauka

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and will work for almost everybody.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this rope for three years, and it’s great. It has a very comfortable grip even if you sweat a lot. I’ve been boxing for a long time and this rope can take serious and long workouts. Both advanced and beginners are able to use it with no problem at all. Very durable and will work for almost everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rope.  Well made.  Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: My experience is this Jump Rope is very fast and the handles appear to be well made. I like the handles, which are little longer than some, and they rotate very fast and smoothly. This rope is faster than ones I've used in the past and required some practice. Of course, the key is making sure the length is correct for your height, arm length and workout/techniques. I've used others and recommend this FitSkuad cable/handles without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Loves this rope! Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to work on double unders, which I can now easily do! This rope is a great value, especially for the price. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scorpion-Master

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rope..!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first jump rope purchase.. Just always used my gyms house ropes, which have been just fine. Recently I learned my DU's and could maintain 20 or so reps before any errors. Once I got this rope in, it was less that a week and I have truly excelled in my DU speed, and consistency. This rope is awesome!! Love the aluminum handles, thin and strong for when you really get to cranking with those wrists. This product and its craftsmanship deserves 5 stars..!
customer_reviews.author: Graywolf

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: 4/5 stars for durability as I’ve only have it ~2 weeks but very happy with the weight of the cable and handles. Great spin, great for beginners before paying more for a more advanced rope
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my rope
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my rope! It’s adjustable in length, which gave me room to find where I was most comfortable. Went from 0 DU to linking 10 in a matter of days. Would be nice if rope was a bright color, to make it more visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best rope for a double unders master!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new jump rope, so I needed a new one. I don't mean to brag, but I have already mastered my double unders. I've been searching for a reliable rope to handle the amount of double unders I do and this rope was perfect! It has easy, adjustable knobs to fit to your height. Also, I like that it comes with an extra cable just in case. I did a trial run with the rope and I felt a smile on my face. Very smooth, quiet rope. It's durable. It dosent hurt too bad when it hits you. I love this rope and you would too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: The grip is awesome. I wear gloves also which makes it even ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and put them to use right away. At first I thought the handles were too small. I have always used weighted jump ropes over the last few years so this was a change for me. After day one I and VERY impressed. It is extremely light weight which allows me to focus more on my form and speed. I don't see myself going back to a weighted rope for awhile. The grip is awesome. I were gloves also which makes it even easier.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burks

customer_reviews.title: I like it. it has good handles and they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it has good handles and they seem to hold much better than I expected. I was concerned the adjustable screw would come lose but it hasn't. It does spin a little different than my old RX rope, but it just required a little adjustment from me. its solid. good rope good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Faster jumps!!
customer_reviews.text: So fast! Not only light weight but also truly makes the rope go around faster than my older jump ropes! Absolutely easier for double-under jumps and faster for usual high knees and other styles!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Best jump rope out there
customer_reviews.text: With a replaceable cable, guide and premium materials you will not find any better offer. The jump rope is as fast as the vendor says. You can adjust the cable so it will fit your height which is great. Another good thing is that Fitskuad sells replacement cables so you will not dump the handles after the cable is worn off (like my previous jump rope). And last but not least, jumping rope with this handles are great, and the design is the best. You will need to get use to it at first in the first minutes of training.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C.O

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid jumprope. It will wear out on your eventually being a plastic covered wire for a rope. But it's high quality so it takes quite a while, plus you get an extra rope.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality jump rope
customer_reviews.text: Great quality jump rope. Lightweight and handles are easy to hold. I'm a beginner, so my intention was to just do singles but many times accidentally did double unders, which is a testament to what a great jump rope this is. I even bought one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Alexander

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: This jump roop has been okay so far. It is smooth but as my hands get sweaty, the handles become more slippery at the metal parts. It would have been nicer if the grip extended all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good rope
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure to tighten up your screws tightly. Mine flew up and it was gone forever. Thank god it came with an extra rope and screw.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: If you jump rope or want too.... BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, when this arrived I thought what the hell.. it is nothing like any jump rope I have ever used... But let me be clear, this thing is the best jump rope I have ever used. Innovative design, functional and up to the task. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I am truly amazed at the technology in this jump rope
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55 years old and have been using the same old jump rope for probably 25 years. You know, wooden handles and a screw in the ends so it does not pivot very well. I am truly amazed at the technology in this jump rope! Wish I had gotten one a long time ago. Double Unders? Never heard of them before I got this rope but I was able to do a few the second time I used it. Now just need to practice and build up my endurance. Thanks for a great product. SuperJim Roku Dan
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: and this is by far the best one I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several $20 jump ropes here on amazon, and this is by far the best one I've used. It has a nice weight in the handles, and it helps that they are longer then normal for extra leverage. Great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: will arellano

customer_reviews.title: I decided I was going to take my time and find a really good rope. This is it
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing CrossFit for years and been through my share of jump ropes. When the plastic handles on my last rope broke mid double under turning my rope into a weapon, I decided I was going to take my time and find a really good rope. This is it. I have been using it for a week or so now, and it turns fast and smooth. The handles feel substantial and well made. So far, this is the best jump rope I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jono

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to tighten the screws
customer_reviews.text: Great jump rope. Does what it says it does. The only thing I would second is the comments others made that you have to tighten the adjustable screws every so often, otherwise while using it the rope will spin out of the handles. Not a big deal, but a minor inconvenience to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Benolkin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Tiny handles and thin wire. Flimsy. This is a return.
customer_reviews.author: kazijo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ropes
customer_reviews.text: There are two sets of ropes, both the same size. It is really like and good for speed jump rope. If you are looking for some weight, these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike_NY

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over loaner ropes
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 ropes and a set of handles. Packaged nicely. I struggle with DUs at the gym with their loaner ropes, but I was able to link several together in my house slippers with this rope.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Better than any Rogue speed rope I’ve ever used. Worth it. This has upped my double unders considerably.
customer_reviews.author: MTalbot

customer_reviews.title: Spend the Money and Save Yourself a Headache
customer_reviews.text: Best jump (speed) rope, ever. I've purchased a ton of ropes from local sporting goods stores as well as online and this rope is the best. Easy to adjust, comes with a spare rope, excellent grips, hurts like hell when you mess up (so you learn faster). The most important features are the ergonomics and the fluid rotation action. I would be surprised if there's a better rope out there.
customer_reviews.author: Coolidge

customer_reviews.title: Good Speed rope to learn double unders
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this rope for more than two years. I learned to do double unders using this rope. I use it at least once a week. I am buying another one as the two cables that come with it have worn off, but is after almost three years of moderate to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This rope is perfect for me. It spins smoothly and is plenty long enough. I am 6’3” and I had to shorten it a few inches. Great buy. Equivalent to what I used at my old CrossFit box.
customer_reviews.author: Team Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Want consistency with your double unders? This is the last rope you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this rope! I'm actually stringing DU's together now effortlessly, and I finally have a well made rope that fits me to a "T". Love that it includes an extra cable, and it's own carrying bag. (It goes with me to the box every time, and nice to have it contained/easy to find) Adjusting it was a breeze compared to other ropes I've tried, and I'm recommending this to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Peloquin

customer_reviews.title: great rope, poor roper jumper
customer_reviews.text: theoretically this jump rope is great. i'm sure it would be if i had the ability to do more than 1 double under in a row. i look forward to many workouts in the future when i learn how to actually jump the aforementioned rope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All the dubs! This is my second FitSkuad rope (only because I dropped a heavy bar on the handle and bent it) and I love this particular brand enough that I bought it again. I've used others and this honestly compares to the more expensive RPM ropes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ort

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The mechanical jump rope system is terrible. The ball bearings are slow and the worst part is the actual rope. The rope is made of actual metal wire and so thin. It’s actually dangerous to use. Not only can you be whipped but possibly get cut. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it but....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this rope but it just didn't work for me. Tried it for a few weeks and DUs actually went down. Can typically get 50-70 unbroken but was well short of that with this rope. Handles are great but the cord itself bends too much and doesn't hold it shape like other ropes I've used. Going back to Rogue long handle. I will say they do have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: dburbank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Lightweight and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Lightweight and easy setup. Seller personally emailed me to make sure that the product was satisfactory. Very happy with this purchase and with the amount of work the seller/founder put in. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: one mallu dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well designed jump rope with cool looking handles that came in a nice package. I have been using it for about four weeks now and am comforted in the choice I have made with this purchase after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different ropes as I've been trying to learn double unders. I really love this rope. It was super nice compared to others I've purchased, spins quick, feels nice in the hand, comes with an extra cable and nice bag. Yeah, I think I found my rope!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great jumprope with excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several different jumpropes but this is by far my favorite. I've been struggling with double unders for awhile and after about a week I can consistently do over 10 with minimal effort. I simply just followed the guide provided with the purchase. I really love the feel of the handles and the speed of the rope. The bag and extra rope are definitely a plus. You absolutely CANNOT beat the customer service that this company provides. I inquired about extra screws and the owner replied within an hour with several different options.
customer_reviews.author: Deegreat

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight; adjustable length; great for beginners to learn to jump-rope
customer_reviews.text: I like how light-weight it is and that I can adjust the length; was recommended by the trainer teaching my outdoor Cross-Fit class. I was trying to use my husband's jump robe with weighted handles & was too heavy. This one perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good rope overall but having owned one for 4-5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good rope overall but having owned one for 4-5 months I have now lost 3 of the 4 screws that were provided, so I can no longer use it. The screws came undone while using the rope, sending the screws flying so I never found them. Being 6' 4" the rope was also an inch or two too short for ideal length. The rubber on one of the handles has also started to split.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Really fast rope and great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great jump rope. I have been trying to do double unders for a month now but the ropes that are available at the gym aren't too good to learn on. I am still not good at double unders but I am getting better. I have adjusted this rope a couple of times until I found the correct length for me.
customer_reviews.author: smhebert

customer_reviews.title: Works better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and manufactured hardware. Having my own rope has helped me progress more in the few weeks I've own it than using my gym's ropes. Works better than advertised!! I'd offer this high quality "jump rope" is a must if your going to add DUBs to your work out.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: No need to untangle
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and have had no problems adjusting the rope to my needs. I am a beginner and I am enjoying not having to untangle the rope. I was considering buying a rope with a counter included, but then I realized that timing this activity is a better measure to compare it to other cardio activities that I also time. Great suggestions on the ebook.
customer_reviews.author: Onlinebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the feel of the able rope and the thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel of the able rope and the thin handles with grip. Still working on double-unders but this rope helps. So far it hasn't broken like a previous similar rope that I have tried. My only gripe would be that I didn't have a tool to cut the rope as easily as I would have wanted. With that said I would rather have a long lasting cable rope that's hard to cut than a soft material one that doesn't last as long or turn as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Get Fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jump rope. There are so many on the market that it can be hard to determine which jump rope fits the perfect routine, whether cross fit, endurance, fitness, etc., this rope pretty much does it all. And really the whole idea is to get a good workout knowing that eventually you'll have to replace some part eventually. Kind of like our own bodies if you're goal is to kick some @## while on this earth. This product will look shiny and new forever if you just stay on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Fast, Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the rope. The hardest part is cutting the excess cable after you measure it to your size. And that's only because it's made so well (cable within the rubber coat). I'm now able to do double-unders and I even take it to the gym so I can use my own.
customer_reviews.author: kmjbevo

customer_reviews.title: I never saw myself as a consumer of thirty dollar jump ropes....
customer_reviews.text: This is streets ahead of the numerous 12 dollar jump ropes that Amazon is festooned with. I'm not going to say I mastered double unders in 15 minutes with this rope but I was able to string several together on my first session with the Fit Skuad. It's way smoother, way faster, and way more consistent turning. You get what you pay for with this product. I need to,order my wife one before she steals mine.
customer_reviews.author: Heath McCorkle

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not as well as my old plastic one
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my old plastic rope broke. I'd had it for 10 years and loved it. With the old plastic rope I could do crossovers, double unders, etc all at a high speed. Now with this rope I mess up more, crossovers are much less consistent, and when this rope hits you it hurts way more. It's not to my liking and I'll be looking for a classic plastic rope
customer_reviews.author: Laura Katherine Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best jump rope
customer_reviews.text: The rope itself is very thin, making it fast and easy to perform cool tricks. The handles are thin, comfortable, and nice to the touch. The ability to adjust the length is a fantastic idea too. It comes with 2 ropes and a little bag which is a plus! By far the best jump rope I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad jump rope...not heavy enough for me. Ended up buying a different one
customer_reviews.author: Brent E.

product_meta.title: Jump Rope Ideal for Taking Your Workout to the Next Level – Features Ball-bearing System and 6 Inch, Extra-Long Handles That Foster Extreme Speed Jumping - Comes With a Carrying Bag, Rapid Results Manual Ebook
product_meta.description:
Improve Your Fitness & Increase Your Speed, Reactions & Coordination with the Ultimate High-Quality Jump Rope!

The jump rope workout is the secret boxers have been using for years to increase their speed, their reaction time and their coordination. The jump rope is also the fitness tool of choice for Cross Training, MMA and *HIIT professionals.

And guess what? A jump rope workout will also get you in shape! Plus, jumping rope is suitable for everyone from beginners to pro athletes who want to improve their fitness. It offers a full body workout, creates muscle tone and definition and you can pack a jump rope easily wherever you travel.

But why should you get the FitSkuad Speed Jump Rope in particular?

Let us count the reasons why:
1. Light, Strong Aluminum Handles With Foam Grip Make This Jump Rope Easy To Hold And Portable
2. 6 Inch Long Handles Allow for an Easy, Comfortable Grip of the Jump Rope
3. Double Ball-Bearing System and Thin Cable Foster Fast Travel Through the Air so You Get That Extra Boost Of Speed
4. Our High-Quality Jump Rope Helps You Focus On The Exercise And Gives You The Powerful Feeling Of The Perfect Cardio
5. This Jump Rope Makes it Easy to Master Double Unders And Even Triple Unders
6. This Powerful Jump Rope Also Saves You Time - 10 Minutes Of Jumping Rope Equals 30 Minutes Of Jogging!

Our jump rope could easily help you reach speeds of up to 320 jumps per minute and turn you into a double unders master!
Plus, if you order now you’ll receive the following three bonuses valued at $29: Double Unders Manual, a Carrying Bag, Extra Cable.
WORRY FREE SHOPPING! We offer LIFE time WARRANTY. If there is an issue with your product for any reason we will SEND YOU A NEW ONE

SO ORDER NOW And when you do, consider getting one for you and one for your WOD partner!
feature_bullets: Black Friday Deal CROSS TRAINING – The Fitskuad Jump Rope is perfect for anyone from Professional Boxers to Cross Trainers to Beginners who want to get in shape and master Double Unders, Triple Unders and even Quadruple Unders!
FULLY ADJUSTABLE – Our jump rope comes with a fully adjustable 10 foot long cable. Fitted with extra-large screws it's very easy to adjust, making it suitable for both ADULTS and KIDS.

LIGHT AND DURABLE – This highest quality jump rope comes with light and very durable aluminum handles and a foam grip for better feel in the hand. The steel cable is coated with a PVC sleeve for protection and better durability. You also get a premium carrying bag so you can take your rope anywhere!

EXTREMELY FAST – Take your jump rope workout to the max with our one-of-a-kind jump rope that is fitted with a very efficient ball-bearing system and 6 inch, extra-long handles to help you keep a high momentum and reach extreme speeds up to 320 jumps per minute. The cable is very thin and travels very fast through the air!

REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE – This jump rope comes with a full 1 Year Limited Warranty and a 120-day replacement guarantee. Plus, when you order now you will also receive an EXTRA Jump Rope Speed CABLE, Free Ebook, “THE SECRET TO MASTERING DOUBLE UNDERS” and the CARRYING BAG! Just click add to cart to take advantage of this special offer while it lasts.
